nodes.bodyText: is this file actually needed, please check and remove if not.
Usually main entry points to the SDK have Firebase as prefix, i.e. FirebaseModelDownloader. We might have missed this in API review, worth being consistent though. pls check with the council
reaching out to api team - will likely go with FirebaseMlModelDownloader

If you only need access to FirebaseOptions, consider depending on them directly.

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        .add(Dependency.required(FirebaseApp.class))
          
          
            
                        .add(Dependency.required(FirebaseOptions.class))
          
      
    
    
  

Context: https://github.com/google/guice/wiki/InjectOnlyDirectDependencies
Updated but will likley need firebaseApp by the time the code is fully written. But I can update as needed.
please add a @hide javadoc comment to this class.
You should change this to false until you actually add integration tests. Testlab considers absence of tests as a failure.
